BT.modules.ClassDiagram.places.joinEdge

Class CDJoinEdgeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.models.CoordinateModel
      • BT.models.LineModel
        • BT.modules.ClassDiagram.places.joinEdge.CDJoinEdgeController

  • public class CDJoinEdgeController
extends LineModel
    Controller for maintaining join edges between classes in class diagram. It will calculate start and end point, draw join edges and checks if it is possible to join these classes with usecases.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

      • drawJoinEdge

        public void drawJoinEdge(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Method encapsuling drawing line. First check start and end point from PointsCalculator. If both ends of line are set, draw this line.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics2D on this it will be drawn.
